impact-statement: Rapid forward engineering can be accomplished using cell-free systems, as demonstrated by the implementation and characterization of novel genetic oscillators in a cell-free system and their consequent transfer to cells.

competing-interest.conf2: The other authors declare that no competing interests exist.
competing-interest.conf1: ZZS, RMM have ownership in a company that commercializes the cell-free technology utilized in this paper.
